thread.title: Police say more than 100 Jewish cemetery headstones damaged in Philadelphia
thread.title_full: Police say more than 100 Jewish cemetery headstones damaged in Philadelphia

author: Tribune news services
title: Police say more than 100 Jewish cemetery headstones damaged in Philadelphia
text:
Police say more than 100 Jewish cemetery headstones damaged in Philadelphia Jewish cemetery vandalism Michael Bryant / AP 
Northeast Philadelphia Police Det. Timothy McIntyre and another Philadelphia police officer look over tombstones that were vandalized in the Jewish Mount Carmel Cemetary Sunday, Feb. 26, 2017 in Philadelphia. 
Northeast Philadelphia Police Det. Timothy McIntyre and another Philadelphia police officer look over tombstones that were vandalized in the Jewish Mount Carmel Cemetary Sunday, Feb. 26, 2017 in Philadelphia. (Michael Bryant / AP)
